mapper.insert: insert into chat (chatName, talker, msg, createdDate) values (#{chatName}, #{talker}, #{msg}, now());
mapper.select: select talker, msg, createdDate from chat where chatName = '${chatName}' order by createdDate
select createdDate from chat where chatName = '${chatName}' order by createdDate desc limit 1;

select IF(count(*) = 0, (select count(*) from chat where chatName = '${chatName}'), count(*)) from chat where chatName = '${chatName}' and createdDate > (select createdDate from chat where chatName = '${chatName}' and talker = 'system' order by createdDate desc limit 1)
